graphenbib

Class MapEdge

  • java.lang.Object
    • graphenbib.MapEdge

  • public class MapEdge
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    arno This is an Edge for a graph. It contains information about the bearing,virtual steps and can be used for several filtered weightening (e.g. max speed or sth.) The ID of the edge does not need to be unique!

       int length,
       StreetType streetType)
        Parameters:
        start - startNode of the edge.
        end - endNode of the edge.
        wayID - The (non-unique) wayID - basing on OSM
        length - Length of the edge
        streetType - The StreetType depending on OSM/Filters

        Computes the Directions from its virtual Step locations to a GPS-position
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        an Array of the bearings (in the same order as the steps along the edge)
